description.en:
In the Megane Danshi Kurabu series:

Volume 1) Maruhi Megane Danshi Kurabu

Shirokane Academy photography club exists not only because of their love for taking pictures, but it is also a secret club for adoring glasses-wearing boys. Their usual work includes finding boys who look good with glasses and taking a picture of them for their club. The club is frowned upon the school's student council, but the girls persevere through various obstacles and continue to share their love and joy for glasses-wearing boys. [Finger Scans]

Volume 2) Moe Megane Danshi Kurabu

Volume 3) Mitsu Megane Danshi Kurabu
